item.title: 苹果：将在批准后发售 iPhone Air 国行
item.guid: 苹果：将在批准后发售-iPhone-Air-国行
item.description:
As one of this year's most anticipated new iPhones, the iPhone Air features a brand-new eSIM design without a physical SIM card slot, and therefore could not be launched for sale immediately. 作为今年最瞩目的新 iPhone 之一，iPhone Air 采用了全新的 eSIM 设计，没有实体 SIM 卡槽，因此未能第一时间启动发售。

iFanr also immediately confirmed this news with Apple officials. Apple stated that it is working closely with regulatory agencies and will launch the iPhone Air for sale as soon as approval is obtained. The full text of Apple's official statement is as follows: 爱范儿也第一时间与苹果官方确认了此消息，苹果官方表示，正与监管机构紧密合作，并将在获批后第一时间启动 iPhone Air 发售。以下为苹果公司官方声明全文：

The new iPhone Air features an ultra-thin and light design, is more durable than any previous iPhone model, boasts professional-grade performance, an innovative Center Stage front camera, a 48-megapixel fusion camera system, and excellent all-day battery life.

We can't wait for users to experience the iPhone Air. We are working closely with regulatory agencies to launch it in China as soon as possible.

iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max will be available for pre-order starting at 8 PM (Beijing time) tonight. We will also launch the sale of iPhone Air as soon as it is approved.

item.title: OpenAI 前 CTO 创业的首个成果公布
item.guid: OpenAI-前-CTO-创业的首个成果公布
item.description:
Yesterday, Thinking Machines Lab (TML), founded by several former OpenAI executives, finally released its first major research paper, "Defeating Nondeterminism in LLM Inference," half a year after its establishment. 昨天，由多位 OpenAI 前高管创立的 Thinking Machines Lab（TML），终于在成立半年后，发布了其首篇重磅研究论文《Defeating Nondeterminism in LLM Inference》（克服 LLM 推理中的不确定性）。

According to TML, it will frequently publish blog posts, open-source code, and various research findings in the future, both to "benefit the public" and to "optimize our own research culture." Its first paper serves as the inaugural work for the new blog series "Connectionism." 据 TML 介绍，未来将频繁发布博客文章、开源代码以及各种研究成果，既是「造福公众」，也是为了「优化我们自己的研究文化」。而其首篇论文则作为全新博客系列《Connectionism》的开山之作。

Previously, it was common to see that AI models like ChatGPT often gave different answers each time, a phenomenon that had long been taken for granted—everyone believed that current AI models are probabilistic models. TML, however, is attempting to solve this long-standing problem with its latest achievement. 此前，大家经常能看到 ChatGPT 等 AI 每次给出的答案都不太一样，而这一现象早就被视作习以为常——大家都认为现在的 AI 模型就是概率模型。而 TML 则试图通过本次成果来解决这个老大难。

Regarding the paper's content, TML believes that the culprit behind the randomness in AI models is actually the GPU kernels—the small programs running on Nvidia chips—which have issues with how they are pieced together during the inference process. 在论文内容方面，TML 认为 AI 模型产生随机性的罪魁祸首，其实是 GPU 内核 —— 就是那些在英伟达芯片里跑的小程序 —— 在推理过程中的拼接方式有问题。

The core author of the article is Horace He, an AI researcher at Thinking Machines Lab. His solution is ingenious: if the execution flow at this layer can be precisely controlled, it might be possible to make AI model outputs more stable and reliable. 文章的核心作者是 Thinking Machines Lab 的 AI 研究员 Horace He，他的解决思路很巧妙，如果能精确控制这一层的执行流程，就有可能让 AI 模型的输出变得更加稳定可靠。

Furthermore, beyond providing more reliable AI responses, enabling AI models to generate repeatable answers has an even greater value—it can significantly improve reinforcement learning (RL) training effectiveness. Horace He believes that more consistent responses can make the entire RL training process much "smoother." 此外，除了提供更靠谱的 AI 响应，让 AI 模型生成可重复的答案还有个更大的价值——能显著改善强化学习（RL）训练效果。Horace He 认为，更一致的响应能让整个 RL 训练过程「丝滑」很多。

It is understood that Mira Murati, former CTO of OpenAI, is also the founder and CEO of Thinking Machines Lab. In July, she stated that Thinking Machines Lab had completed $2 billion in funding, and its first product would debut in the coming months, greatly benefiting researchers and startups developing custom models. 据了解，Mira Murati 是 OpenAI 的前 CTO，同时目前也是 Thinking Machines Lab 的创始人兼 CEO。她在 7 月份就曾表示 Thinking Machines Lab 已经完成 20 亿美元的融资，且首款产品将在未来几个月内亮相，并且会对研究人员和正在开发定制模型的初创公司大有裨益。

According to the latest news, TML's valuation has soared to $12 billion (approximately 85 billion RMB), despite having "0 products and 0 users." 而据最新消息显示，TML 在「0 产品 0 用户」的情况下，估值已经狂飙 120 亿美元（折合人民币 850 亿元）。

item.title: 「支付宝碰一下」用户数突破 2 亿
item.guid: 「支付宝碰一下」用户数突破-2-亿
item.description:
At yesterday's 2025 Inclusion · Bund Conference, Alipay announced the latest data for "Tap to Pay": its user base has exceeded 200 million, with nearly 100 million added in the last 4 months, doubling the growth rate of its first 100 million users and setting a new record for internet product growth. 在昨天的 2025 Inclusion · 外滩大会上，支付宝公布「碰一下」最新数据： 用户规模已突破 2 亿，其中近 1 亿来自最近 4 个月，新增速度比首个 1 亿用户快了一倍，刷新互联网产品增速纪录。

Official data shows that "Tap to Pay" now covers over 1,000 segmented scenarios, with nearly 100 million users having used at least two services, gradually becoming a new service entry point. In scenarios offering both "Scan to Pay" and "Tap to Pay," 80% of users prioritize "Tap to Pay," indicating that the new interaction method is forming muscle memory. 官方数据显示，目前「碰一下」已覆盖超 1000 个细分场景，近 1 亿用户使用过至少 2 项服务，正逐渐成为服务新入口。在同时提供「扫一下」和「碰一下」的场景中，8 成用户优先选择「碰一下」，新交互方式正在形成肌肉记忆。

According to official introduction, "Tap to Pay" application scenarios are continuously expanding: 据官方介绍，「碰一下」应用场景正持续扩张：

  • Nearly 100 million people have used "Tap to Pay" to grab red packets and claim coupons in the past month; 近 1 亿人次在过去一个月通过「碰一下」抢红包、领券；
  • Over 400,000 shared e-bikes support "Tap to Pay" for unlocking, with an average of 1 in 3 users choosing to use it; 超 40 万辆共享电动车支持「碰一下」解锁，平均每 3 位用户就有 1 位选择使用；
  • Over 100,000 courier lockers at stations have introduced "Tap to Pay," with nearly 10 million monthly uses. 超 10 万个驿站快递柜引入「碰一下」，月使用次数近 1000 万。

In terms of consumer and merchant digitalization, "Tap to Pay" also demonstrates powerful energy. Official data shows that in pilot cities like Qingdao and Zhengzhou, every 1 yuan invested in "Tap to Pay" discounts can leverage 10 yuan in consumption. "Tap to Pay Membership Payment" has been launched in 200,000 stores, with over 400 million cumulative uses, helping retail and catering merchants acquire new brands and manage members. 在消费与商家数字化方面，「碰一下」同样展现出强大能量。官方数据显示，在青岛、郑州等试点城市，每投入 1 元「碰一下」优惠即可撬动 10 元消费。「碰一下会员付」已在 20 万家门店上线，累计使用超 4 亿次，助力零售和餐饮商家品牌拉新和会员运营。

It is worth mentioning that hardware manufacturers such as Huawei, OPPO, vivo, Xiaomi, Honor, Xiaotiancai, Garmin, Rokid, Quark, and Rayneo have jointly launched the "Tap to Pay Application Ecosystem Alliance" with Alipay, aiming to achieve "everything can be tapped, tap for everything." 值得一提的是，硬件厂商如华为、OPPO、vivo、小米、荣耀、小天才、佳明、Rokid、夸克、雷鸟等已与支付宝联合发起「碰一下应用生态联盟」，意在实现「一切可碰、碰出一切」。

Alipay stated that in the AI era, "Tap to Pay" will serve as a new interaction method to connect users with services, promoting digital upgrades across various industries and creating more value. 支付宝方面表示，在 AI 时代，「碰一下」将作为新交互方式连接用户与服务，推动各行各业数字化升级，创造更多价值。

item.title: 未来 iPhone「顶配售价」或会突破 2000 美元
item.guid: 未来-iPhone「顶配售价」或会突破-2000-美元
item.description:
Yesterday, Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman pointed out in his latest report that Apple is gradually guiding consumers to accept iPhone prices at the "$2,000" level. 昨日，彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 在其最新报道中指出，苹果正在逐步引导消费者接受「2000 美元」级别的 iPhone 售价。

It is reported that with the official debut of the iPhone 17 series, the top-tier iPhone 17 Pro Max will for the first time introduce a "2TB" storage option, priced at a record-high $1,999 for an iPhone. 据悉，随着 iPhone 17 系列正式亮相，顶配版 iPhone 17 Pro Max 首次推出「2TB」存储选项，售价高达 1,999 美元，创下 iPhone 历史新高。

Gurman stated that since Apple launched the iPhone X in 2017, the starting price of its latest flagship model (iPhone 17 Pro) has only increased by '100 US dollars'. However, Gurman also said that, with technological upgrades and rising costs, the upward trend in iPhone prices has gradually become apparent. Gurman 表示，苹果自 2017 年推出 iPhone X 以来，其如今最新舰机型（iPhone 17 Pro）起售价也仅上涨了「100 美元」。但 Gurman 也表示， 随着技术升级与成本上升，iPhone 的售价上涨趋势已逐渐显现。

His analysis suggests that Apple will continue to push its high-end pricing strategy in the future, especially with the upcoming debut of its first foldable iPhone, which is expected to start at 'twice' the price of the current iPhone Air, or '2,000 US dollars'. 其分析认为，苹果未来将持续推动高端定价策略， 尤其是即将登场的首款折叠屏 iPhone，预计售价将至少为当前 iPhone Air 的「两倍」，即「2,000 美元」起跳。

Apple CEO Tim Cook once stated in an earnings call, 'People are willing to pay more for products they believe are the best,' emphasizing that the iPhone has become an indispensable part of users' lives, covering various areas such as payments, health management, and smart home control. 苹果 CEO 库克曾在财报会议上表示：「人们愿意为他们认为最好的产品支付更高的价格」，并强调 iPhone 已成为用户生活中不可或缺的一部分，涵盖支付、健康管理、智能家居控制等多个领域。

In addition, the report also mentioned that Apple is preparing a 'iPhone 20' commemorative model (i.e., the previously reported 20th-anniversary iPhone), which is expected to bring major changes similar to the iPhone X, and therefore may further push the upper limit of iPhone pricing. 此外，报道还提到，苹果还在筹备「iPhone 20」纪念版机型（即此前报道的 20 周年版 iPhone）， 该机型预计将带来类似 iPhone X 的重大变革，因此可能会进一步刷新 iPhone 的定价上限。

According to previous news, the iPhone 20 that Apple is preparing will be an 'all-glass iPhone': adopting a 'quad-curved screen' design, where the curved glass touchscreen will cover the phone's bezels, changing the straight-edge design used for five years, and is expected to be more in line with iOS's new 'liquid glass' design language. 据此前消息，苹果正在准备的这台 iPhone 20 将会是一台「全玻璃 iPhone」：采用「四曲面屏」设计，弧形玻璃触控屏将覆盖手机边框，改变沿用了五年的直边设计，预计将和 iOS 新的「液态玻璃」设计语言更契合。

It's worth noting that due to 'many Pro features and configurations being brought down, and the price of the base model (256GB) not increasing (starting price of 5999 yuan),' the iPhone 17's JD.com e-commerce pre-order volume has exceeded 2.5 million. 值得一提的是，iPhone 17 因「许多 Pro 功能和配置下放，基础版（256GB）价格没上涨（起售价为 5999 元）」， 其京东电商预约量已突破 250 万。

It is reported that this pre-order volume is more than ten times that of the iPhone 16. In the same period last year (one day later), the iPhone 16's pre-order volume on the same platform was only around 170,000. 据悉，该预约量是 iPhone 16 的整整十倍还多。而去年同期（一天后） iPhone 16 在同平台的预约量仅 17 万左右。

Furthermore, the iPhone 17 Pro series pre-order volume has also exceeded 3 million (Pro Max over 1.7 million, Pro over 1.4 million), and the iPhone Air, with a smaller market scope, has also surpassed 260,000 pre-orders. 另外，iPhone 17 Pro 系列预约量也已突破 300 万（Pro Max 破 170 万，Pro 破 140 万），而市场范围较小的 iPhone Air 预约量也超过了 26 万。

item.title: 罗永浩「大战」西贝，后者创始人称「会起诉」
item.guid: 罗永浩「大战」西贝，后者创始人称「会起诉」
item.description:
On September 10, Luo Yonghao posted, 'It's been a long time since I ate at Xibei (Xibei莜面村). Today, after getting off the plane, I had a meal with colleagues and found that almost all the dishes were pre-made, and so expensive, it was really disgusting.' He also expressed hope that the country would push for legislation as soon as possible to mandate restaurants to indicate whether they use pre-made dishes.￼ 9 月 10 日，罗永浩发文称「好久没吃西贝（西贝莜面村）了，今天下飞机跟同事吃了一顿，发现几乎全都是预制菜，还那么贵，实在是太恶心了。」并表示希望国家尽早推动立法，强制饭馆注明是否用了预制菜。￼

According to a report by Xin Huanghe, the chain restaurant enterprise Xibei莜面村 held a press conference last night and issued a strong response. 而据新黄河报道，连锁餐饮企业西贝莜面村在昨日晚召开新闻发布会，并做出强硬回应。

A representative from Xibei explicitly stated that, according to the latest definition released by six national departments in March this year, 'not a single dish' ordered by Luo Yonghao that day was a 'pre-made dish,' and his claim that 'they were all pre-made dishes, it was disgusting' was 'quite hurtful to us.' 西贝方面负责人明确表示，按照国家六部门今年 3 月发布的最新定义， 罗永浩当日所点菜品「没有一道是预制菜」，并称其「全是预制菜，太恶心了」的说法「挺伤害我们的」。

Xibei also provided a detailed reconstruction of Luo Yonghao and his party's dining situation yesterday. It was revealed that Luo Yonghao's group of five dined in a private room, ordering a total of 13 different dishes, with 'Beef and Potato Strips' and 'A Skewer of Lamb, Roasted Naan' ordered in double portions, totaling 15 dishes, with a total consumption of 830 yuan. The group's meal lasted approximately 50 minutes. 西贝方面还详细还原了罗永浩一行人昨日的用餐情况。据透露，罗永浩一行五人在一个包间内就餐，总共点了 13 道不同的菜，其中「牛肉土豆条」「一把羊肉串、烤馕」点了双份，合计 15 份菜品，总消费为 830 元。一行人用餐全程约 50 分钟。

After the meeting, Xibei founder Jia Guolong accepted media interviews and revealed more details about Luo Yonghao's meal: 会后，西贝创始人贾国龙接受媒体采访并透露了更多罗永浩用餐细节：

    After Luo Yonghao and his party finished their meal, when the waiter asked, 'How was the food?', the on-site reply they received was 'Quite good';

    During the checkout process, the waiter asked if they wanted to accumulate membership points, and the accompanying person who paid said 'yes'. This action is usually seen as a signal that consumers have a certain degree of recognition for the brand and are willing to make repeat purchases or engage in deeper loyalty. Jia Guolong inferred that the person who paid and handled the points was likely not Luo Yonghao himself, but rather his assistant or friend.

When reporters asked Jia Guolong if he 'would sue Luo Yonghao,' he made a clear and firm statement: 'Absolutely, we will definitely sue him, we will definitely, definitely sue him!' 'He has caused us great harm.' 当记者询问贾国龙「是否会起诉罗永浩」时，其做出明确且强硬的表态：「一定会，我们一定会起诉他，一定一定会起诉他！」「他对我们的伤害是很大的」。

When asked how he viewed Luo Yonghao as a Xibei user and the act of suing a user, Jia Guolong separated Luo Yonghao's 'consumer identity' from his 'blogger behavior.' Jia Guolong explained: 'A user is a user, and I thank him for consuming. But his behavior has gone beyond that of a normal consumer.' 当被问及如何看待罗永浩作为西贝的用户，以及起诉用户的行为时，贾国龙将罗永浩的「消费者身份」与他的「博主行为」进行了切割。贾国龙解释：「用户是用户，我感谢他来消费。但他的行为已经跨出了一个正常消费者的行为。」

Furthermore, Jia Guolong directly targeted Luo Yonghao's other core accusation — 'expensive prices.' He emotionally stated in the interview that the widespread belief that 'Xibei is expensive' is the 'biggest miscarriage of justice' in China's catering industry in recent years. 另外，贾国龙将矛头直接对准了罗永浩的另一项核心指控 ——「价格贵」。他在采访中情绪激动地表示，外界普遍认为「西贝贵」是近两年中国餐饮业的「最大冤案」。

At the same time, to let consumers personally experience whether it's 'worth it,' Xibei announced that starting tomorrow, it will launch the 'Luo Yonghao Menu' in all its stores nationwide. Jia Guolong clarified that this is not a fixed set meal, but rather a list of dishes Luo Yonghao ordered, from which consumers can freely choose. 同时，为了让消费者亲身体验「值不值」，西贝宣布将从明天起，在全国所有门店上线「罗永浩菜单」。贾国龙澄清，这不是一个固定的套餐，而是罗永浩点过的菜品列表，消费者可以任意点选。

Xibei made two major promises for this: 'If it's not delicious, you don't pay,' customers can cancel their order at any time; and customers are welcome to enter the kitchen at any time to observe the entire preparation process of any dish. 西贝为此提供了两大承诺： 「不好吃，不要钱」，顾客可以随时退单；欢迎顾客随时进入后厨，参观任何一道菜的制作全过程。

Yesterday, Luo Yonghao also posted multiple Weibo messages, continuously questioning whether 'Xibei's dishes are freshly made'. He stated that the reason the leftovers were not packed was due to a strong overnight food smell, and emphasized that Xibei's portion sizes are very small. 昨天，罗永浩也连发多条微博持续质疑「西贝是否现做」。 其表示之所以剩菜没打包，是因为有很浓的隔夜菜味道，并强调西贝菜量很小。

In the evening, Luo Yonghao even uploaded two photos of Xibei's packaged cooked products, pointing out phrases like 'dine-in bagged' and 'not directly provided to consumers'. Luo Yonghao also posted an appeal to experts in the food or chemical industry, stating that he 'wants to sweep through all restaurants that use pre-made dishes but refuse to tell the truth.' 晚间，罗永浩更是上传了两张西贝的熟制品包装，并指出「堂食袋装」「非直接提供消费者」等字样。罗永浩还发文召集食品工业或化学工业的专家，称「要把用了预制菜后不肯说实话的餐馆￼横扫一遍。」

item.title: 宇树官宣 IPO 后，CEO 王兴兴首次发声
item.guid: 宇树官宣-IPO-后，CEO-王兴兴首次发声
item.description:
On September 11, during the 2025 Inclusion·Bund Conference, Unitree Robotics founder and CEO Wang Xingxing stated during a roundtable forum: 9 月 11 日，在 2025 Inclusion·外滩大会期间，宇树科技创始人兼 CEO 王兴兴在圆桌论坛发言时表示：

Currently, AI writing and painting are already better than 99.99% of people. But truly putting AI to work is still a barren land.

It's worth noting that this was Wang Xingxing's first public appearance since Unitree Robotics announced its IPO plan, where he discussed the opportunities and challenges for the robotics industry in the era of large models. 值得一提的是，这是宇树科技宣布 IPO 计划后，王兴兴首次公开现身，畅谈大模型时代机器人产业发展的机遇与挑战。

During his speech, Wang Xingxing revealed that he was very interested in AI in 2011, but at that time, AI was very niche. 'I read a few books then and felt there was limited scope, so I didn't spend much time on it later. AI is indeed one of my biggest regrets,' Wang Xingxing said. However, fortunately, with the rapid development of large models, there is finally an opportunity to combine AI with robots and truly put them to work. 发言中，王兴兴透露，在 2011 年时他曾对 AI 也非常感兴趣，但当时 AI 非常冷门。「当时我看了几本书，觉得能做的有限，后来就没花太多时间关注。AI 确实是我最后悔的一件事」王兴兴说，不过好在随着大模型的快速发展，现在终于有机会，让 AI 与机器人结合，真正落地干活。

In fact, the integrated development of AI and robotics is giving rise to a brand new embodied AI industry, which means enabling robots to possess AGI capabilities, allowing them to perceive, plan, and act autonomously like humans. Wang Xingxing believes that the current development of embodied AI still faces some challenges, including high-quality data and model algorithm levels. 实际上，AI 与机器人的融合发展正在催生全新的具身智能产业，也就是让机器人拥有 AGI 能力，能像人一样自主感知、规划和行动。王兴兴认为， 当前具身智能发展仍然存在一些挑战，包括高质量数据以及模型算法层面。

In addition to data and model algorithms, organizational management in the AI era is also a new subject. Wang Xingxing stated that Unitree is a company primarily focused on hardware products, and as its business rapidly expands and its workforce grows, it may lead to a decrease in collaboration efficiency, requiring time to explore more efficient organizational management methods. 除了数据及模型算法外，AI 时代的组织管理也是一门新课题。王兴兴表示，宇树是一家以硬件为主要产品的公司，随着业务快速发展，人员规模更大之后，可能会带来协作效率的降低，需要花时间探索更高效的组织管理方式。

Despite the challenges, Wang Xingxing remains very optimistic about the future. He believes that the threshold for innovation and entrepreneurship has significantly lowered, and young innovators have entered a good era. New ideas can truly be realized with AI tools, and in the AI era, the explosive power of small organizations will become increasingly strong. 尽管存在挑战，但王兴兴对未来依旧十分乐观，他认为现在创新创业的门槛已经大幅降低，年轻创新者迎来了好时代。真正可以用 AI 工具去实现新创意，并且在 AI 时代，小组织的爆发力会越来越强。

Wang Xingxing believes that truly putting AI to work is still on the eve of a large-scale explosion, 'and this era is very inspiring.' Wang Xingxing said, the AI era is very fair; as long as one is smart and willing to work, towering trees will eventually grow in the desert. 王兴兴认为，真正让 AI 落地干活，现在还在大规模爆发的前夜，「而这个时代是非常感动人心的。」王兴兴说， AI 时代非常公平，只要聪明，愿意做事，荒漠中终会长出参天大树。

To the younger generation aspiring to innovate and start businesses, he advises, 'Forget past experiences, learn the latest knowledge, and fully embrace the new era.' 对有志于创新创业的年轻一代，他建议「忘记过去的经验，学习当下最新的知识，全力拥抱新时代。」

item.title: 价值 3000 亿美元，OpenAI 与甲骨文达成新合作
item.guid: 价值-3000-亿美元，OpenAI-与甲骨文达成新合作
item.description:
According to informed sources, AI startup OpenAI and cloud service giant Oracle have reached a five-year cooperation agreement, totaling up to $300 billion , for the procurement of computing resources. This deal not only far exceeds OpenAI's current annual revenue but also becomes one of the largest contracts in the global cloud computing sector to date. 据知情人士透露，人工智能初创公司 OpenAI 与云服务巨头甲骨文达成一项为期五年的合作协议， 总金额高达 3000 亿美元 ，用于采购计算资源。这一交易不仅远超 OpenAI 当前的年营收，也成为全球云计算领域迄今为止最大规模的合同之一。

The agreement will officially take effect in 2027 and is expected to bring Oracle over $60 billion in annual revenue. Oracle disclosed in its latest financial report that its future contract revenue increased by $317 billion, with most of it coming from this cooperation with OpenAI. 协议将于 2027 年正式生效，预计将为甲骨文带来每年超过 600 亿美元的收入。甲骨文在最新财报中披露，其未来合同收入新增 3170 亿美元，其中大部分来自此次与 OpenAI 的合作。

This cooperation will involve 4.5 gigawatts (GW) of power capacity, equivalent to the power generation of two Hoover Dams, or the electricity demand of approximately 4 million households. Oracle will collaborate with data center builders like Crusoe to construct next-generation AI data centers in locations such as Wyoming, Pennsylvania, Texas, Michigan, and New Mexico. 此次合作将涉及 4.5 吉瓦（GW）的电力容量，相当于两座胡佛水坝的发电量，或约 400 万户家庭的用电需求。甲骨文将与数据中心建设商 Crusoe 等合作，在怀俄明州、宾夕法尼亚州、德克萨斯州、密歇根州和新墨西哥州等地建设新一代 AI 数据中心。

OpenAI previously relied primarily on Microsoft for computing resources, but due to supply constraints, the company was granted permission to seek new partners. This cooperation with Oracle has also been incorporated into its 'Stargate' data center project. OpenAI 此前主要依赖微软提供算力资源，但由于供应紧张，该公司获得许可寻找新的合作伙伴。此次与甲骨文的合作也被纳入其数据中心项目「Stargate」旗下。

Furthermore, according to Forbes' latest rich list for 2025, Oracle founder Larry Ellison's net worth surged to $386 billion on September 10 due to a sharp rise in the company's stock price, briefly surpassing Elon Musk to claim the title of the world's richest person. 另据 2025 年福布斯最新公布的富豪榜单显示，甲骨文创办人拉里·艾利森（Larry Ellison）在 9 月 10 日因公司股价暴涨，身价一度飙升至 3860 亿美元，短暂超越马斯克，登上全球首富宝座。

It is understood that Oracle's stock price rose by as much as 43% on September 10, closing with a gain of 35.95%, marking its largest single-day increase since 1992. 据了解，甲骨文 9 月 10 日股价最高上涨 43%，收盘涨幅为 35.95%，创下 1992 年以来最大单日涨幅。

item.title: 京东回应王腾入职：没这样的安排和计划
item.guid: 京东回应王腾入职：没这样的安排和计划
item.description:
Recently, news circulated on social media platforms claiming that Wang Teng, former General Manager of Xiaomi's China Marketing Department and former General Manager of the REDMI brand, had joined JD.com, taking on a role related to Xiaomi procurement and sales. This news quickly drew industry attention, with various speculations about his job level, some rumored as 'P5' and others as 'P7'. 日前，有社交平台上流传消息称，小米前中国区市场部总经理、前 REDMI 品牌总经理王腾已入职京东，担任小米采销相关岗位。该消息迅速引发业内关注，关于其职级也众说纷纭，有传为「P5」，亦有称为「P7」。

However, according to Blue Whale Finance, JD.com responded to the situation, explicitly stating 'there are currently no relevant arrangements or plans,' denying the rumors of Wang Teng joining. 而据蓝鲸财经方面消息， 京东针对上述情况作出回应，明确表示「目前没有相关安排和计划」，否认了王腾入职的传闻。

It is reported that Wang Teng worked at Xiaomi for many years, leading the marketing and promotion of several popular products, and his movements have always been closely watched by the industry. 据悉，王腾曾在小米任职多年，主导多个爆款产品的市场推广，其动向一直备受行业瞩目。

Recently, Xiaomi issued an internal announcement on Monday (September 8), stating that Wang Teng was dismissed due to serious violations and disciplinary actions such as leaking company confidential information and conflicts of interest. On the day of the incident, Wang Teng himself posted, saying he "made some mistakes in the past" and was "very reluctant to leave." 近期，小米于周一（9 月 8 日）发布内部公告，指王腾因泄露公司机密信息，且存在利益冲突等严重违规违纪行为被辞退。事发当天，王腾本人发文表示「过去犯了一些错误」、「非常不舍离开」。

Regarding the rumors, Wang Teng posted again on the 9th, denying stealing and selling company secrets, stating that he "did not receive money from others," "did not commit illegal acts," but admitted to "dereliction of duty." 对于传闻，王腾于 9 日再次发文，否认窃取公司机密出售，表示「没有收人钱财」、「没有做违法行为」，但承认「有失职行为」。

item.title: 小鹏「陆地航母」获阿联酋特许飞行证
item.guid: 小鹏「陆地航母」获阿联酋特许飞行证
item.description:
Yesterday, Xpeng Aeroht announced that its "Land Aircraft Carrier" X3-F completed a flight demonstration at the Jazira Aviation Club in Ras Al Khaimah, UAE, on September 10 local time, and obtained a special flight permit issued by the UAE General Civil Aviation Authority. 昨天，小鹏汇天发文宣布，旗下「陆地航母」飞行器 X3-F 于当地时间 9 月 10 日在阿联酋哈伊马角贾济拉飞行基地完成飞行演示，并获得阿联酋民航局颁发的特许飞行证。

It is reported that this is the first time a Chinese flying car company has obtained a flight permit for a manned aircraft overseas. 据悉，这是中国飞行汽车企业首次在海外获得有人驾驶航空器的飞行许可。

According to official sources, during the demonstration, the X3-F aircraft performed maneuvers such as hovering, forward flight, 360-degree rotation, side flight, and coordinated turns, demonstrating stable control performance. Sheikh Saud, a member of the UAE Federal Supreme Council and Ruler of Ras Al Khaimah, and Zhang Yiming, the Chinese Ambassador to the UAE, observed the demonstration on site. 据官方消息，X3-F 飞行器在演示过程中完成了悬停、前飞、360 度旋转、侧飞及协调转弯等动作，展现出稳定的操控性能。阿联酋联邦最高委员会成员、哈伊马角酋长谢赫 · 苏欧德与中国驻阿联酋大使张益明现场观摩了演示过程。

After the flight demonstration, Xpeng Aeroht signed a strategic cooperation agreement with the Ras Al Khaimah Transport Authority. The two parties will collaborate on areas such as flying car test flight certification and scenario applications. According to the agreement, the X3-F aircraft will explore diverse application scenarios in the UAE in the future, including government transportation, flight experiences, tourism, and emergency rescue. 在飞行演示结束后，小鹏汇天与哈伊马角交通局签署战略合作协议，双方将围绕飞行汽车试飞认证、场景应用等领域展开合作。根据协议内容，X3-F 飞行器未来将在阿联酋探索政府交通、飞行体验、旅游观光及应急救援等多元应用场景。

Officially, the X3-F aircraft's cockpit is equipped with an intelligent large screen, supporting both automatic and manual driving modes. The automatic mode enables intelligent route editing, one-key takeoff and return, 3D composite vision, and landing view assistance; the manual mode uses a single-stick control system, integrating 6 degrees of freedom operation, allowing users to freely switch between "comfort" and "sport" modes. 官方介绍，X3-F 飞行器座舱配备智能化大屏，支持自动与手动双模式驾驶。自动模式下可实现智能航线编辑、一键起飞返航、3D 复合视觉与降落视野辅助等功能；手动模式则采用单杆操控系统，集成 6 自由度操作，用户可在「舒适」与「运动」模式间自由切换。

It is reported that Ras Al Khaimah, as one of the seven emirates of the UAE, is actively planning for future transportation by leveraging its innovative policies and geographical advantages. This cooperation not only enhances the region's influence in global technological innovation but also provides valuable experience for Chinese flying car companies expanding overseas. 据悉，哈伊马角作为阿联酋七大酋长国之一，凭借其创新政策与地理优势，正积极布局未来交通领域。此次合作不仅提升了当地在全球科技创新中的影响力，也为中国飞行汽车出海提供了宝贵经验。

item.title: 比尔盖茨跌出福布斯美国富豪前十
item.guid: 比尔盖茨跌出福布斯美国富豪前十
item.description:
In this year's latest Forbes rich list, the number of global billionaires set a new record in 2025, reaching 3,028, with a total wealth of up to $16.1 trillion, an increase of nearly $2 trillion from last year. The United States continues to lead globally with 902 billionaires, followed by China (including Hong Kong) with 516 and India with 205. 在今年福布斯最新公布的富豪榜单中，全球亿万富翁人数在 2025 年再度刷新纪录，达到 3028 位，总财富高达 16.1 万亿美元，较去年增长近 2 万亿美元。美国以 902 位亿万富翁继续领跑全球，其后依次为中国(含香港）516 位和印度 205 位。

In the latest list, Tesla and SpaceX founder Elon Musk firmly holds the position of the world's richest person with a net worth of $342 billion, retaining the title of America's richest person for four consecutive years. He is followed by Meta founder Mark Zuckerberg ($216 billion) and Amazon founder Jeff Bezos ($215 billion), with the technology sector remaining the main driver of wealth growth. 在最新榜单中， 特斯拉与 SpaceX 创始人埃隆 · 马斯克以 3420 亿美元的净资产稳居世界首富之位，连续四年蝉联美国首富。 紧随其后的是 Meta 创始人马克 · 扎克伯格（2160 亿美元）与亚马逊创始人杰夫 · 贝索斯（2150 亿美元），科技行业依旧是财富增长的主力。

It is worth noting that, after falling out of second place in 2021, Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates's ranking continued to decline, dropping to 13th place with a net worth of $108 billion. This is the first time he has fallen out of the top ten richest Americans since 1991. It is understood that Gates has continuously increased his charitable donations in recent years and announced in May this year that he would donate 99% of his wealth over the next 20 years to areas such as public health and education. 值得关注的是， 继 2021 年跌出第二后，微软联合创始人比尔 · 盖茨的排名继续下滑，跌至第 13 位，净资产为 1080 亿美元。 这是他自 1991 年以来首次跌出美国十大富豪之列。据了解，盖茨近年来持续加大慈善捐赠力度，并在今年 5 月宣布将在未来 20 年内将其 99% 的财富捐出，用于公共卫生与教育等领域。

In addition, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang ranked 16th with $98.7 billion, becoming the wealthiest entrepreneur in the chip industry; TikTok founder Zhang Yiming ranked 23rd with $65.5 billion, making him one of China's richest tech entrepreneurs; Japan's richest person remains Tadashi Yanai, founder of Fast Retailing Group, with a net worth of $45.1 billion, ranking 30th. 此外，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋以 987 亿美元位列第 16，成为芯片行业最富有的企业家；TikTok 创始人张一鸣以 655 亿美元位居第 23，是中国最富有的科技企业家之一；日本首富依旧是迅销集团创始人柳井正，净资产达 451 亿美元，排名第 30。

item.title: 蔚来宣布 10 亿美元融资计划
item.guid: 蔚来宣布-10-亿美元融资计划
item.description:
Nio recently officially announced its $1 billion equity financing plan, intending to raise funds by issuing a total of 181,818,190 Class A ordinary shares , comprising both American Depositary Shares (ADS) and ordinary shares in the Hong Kong market. The offering price for ADS is $5.57 per share, and for ordinary shares, it is HK$43.36 per share. 蔚来汽车近日正式公布其 10 亿美元股权融资计划，拟通过发行共计 181,818,190 股 A 类普通股筹集资金 ，其中包括美国存托股票（ADS）与香港市场的普通股两部分。ADS 的发行价为每股 5.57 美元，普通股发行价为每股 43.36 港元。

It is reported that this financing will be jointly underwritten by institutions such as Morgan Stanley Asia Limited, UBS Securities, and Deutsche Bank Hong Kong Branch. Nio has also granted the underwriters a 30-day option to purchase up to an additional 27,272,728 ADS. 据悉，此次融资将由摩根士丹利亚洲有限公司、瑞银证券、德意志银行香港分行等机构联合承销。蔚来还授予承销商 30 天期权，可额外购买最多 27,272,728 股 ADS。

Nio stated that the funds raised will primarily be used for the research and development of core technologies for smart electric vehicles, the development of future technology platforms and models, the expansion of battery swapping and charging networks, strengthening financial stability, and other general corporate purposes. 蔚来方面表示，此次募集的资金将主要用于智能电动汽车核心技术的研发、未来技术平台与车型的开发、换电与充电网络的扩展、增强财务稳健性以及其他一般企业用途。

Nio was founded in November 2014 and owns three brands: "Nio," "Onvo," and "Firefly," covering the high-end, family, and small smart electric vehicle markets. The company stated that it will continue to uphold "Blue Sky Coming" as its mission, promoting sustainable mobility and technological innovation. 蔚来成立于 2014 年 11 月，旗下拥有「蔚来」、「乐道」与「萤火虫」三大品牌，覆盖高端、家用与小型智能电动车市场。该公司表示将继续以「Blue Sky Coming」为使命，推动可持续出行与技术创新。

Nio emphasized that this equity financing is still subject to customary closing conditions, with the ADS portion expected to close on September 11 and the ordinary share portion on September 17. The company reminds investors that the financing plan has uncertainties, and the final outcome will depend on market conditions. 蔚来强调，此次股权融资尚需满足惯常交割条件，ADS 部分预计于 9 月 11 日完成交割，普通股部分则预计于 9 月 17 日完成。公司提醒投资者，融资计划存在不确定性，最终结果仍需视市场情况而定。

item.title: 工信部：苹果多系统存在高危漏洞，已被用于网络攻击
item.guid: 工信部：苹果多系统存在高危漏洞，已被用于网络攻击
item.description:
Recently, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology's Cybersecurity Threat and Vulnerability Information Sharing Platform issued a "Risk Alert on Preventing High-Risk Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerabilities in Apple's iOS/iPadOS/macOS." 近日，工业和信息化部网络安全威胁和漏洞信息共享平台发布「关于防范苹果公司 iOS/iPadOS/macOS 越界写入高危漏洞的风险提示」。

The announcement stated that Apple's iOS, iPadOS, and macOS systems have high-risk out-of-bounds write vulnerabilities that have been exploited by malicious actors for cyberattacks. It is reported that this vulnerability originates from the ImageIO framework in Apple's operating system, which can lead to memory corruption when processing malicious image files, thereby causing system security issues. 公告称， 苹果的 iOS、iPadOS 及 macOS 系统存在越界写入高危漏洞，已被不法分子用于网络攻击。 据悉，该漏洞源于苹果操作系统中的 ImageIO 框架，在处理恶意图像文件时可能导致内存损坏，进而引发系统安全问题。

Affected versions include: 受影响的版本包括：

    iOS versions below "18.6.2"; iPadOS versions below "18.6.2" and "17.7.10";

    macOS Sequoia versions below "15.6.1"; macOS Sonoma versions below "14.7.8"; macOS Ventura versions below "13.7.8".

Currently, Apple has issued security advisories and fixed the relevant vulnerabilities. The Ministry of Industry and Information Technology recommends that relevant units and users immediately conduct vulnerability checks and upgrade to the latest secure versions as soon as possible to prevent potential cyber attack risks. 目前，苹果已发布安全公告并修复相关漏洞。工信部建议相关单位和用户立即开展隐患排查，尽快升级至最新安全版本，以防范潜在网络攻击风险。

item.title: 小米拿下 2025 上半年全球高端手机市场第三
item.guid: 小米拿下-2025-上半年全球高端手机市场第三
item.description:
Recently, market research firm Counterpoint Research released its latest report, which shows: 日前，市场研究机构 Counterpoint Research 发布最新报告显示：

In the first half of 2025, global premium smartphone market (priced over $600) sales grew by 8% year-on-year, reaching a new high for the same period in history. Against the backdrop of only 4% growth in the overall global smartphone market, the strong performance of the premium market highlights its strategic value.

The report points out that premium devices already contribute over 60% of global smartphone revenue. As consumers' affordability improves, they tend to upgrade to more innovative premium products, and the "premiumization" trend is accelerating globally. Specifically, in terms of brands: 报告指出，高端设备已贡献全球智能手机营收的超过 60%。消费者在可负担能力提升的同时，倾向于升级至更具创新性的高端产品，「高端化」趋势在全球范围内加速蔓延。具体来看，在品牌方面：

    Apple continues to lead with a 62% market share, despite only growing by 3% year-on-year, showing strong performance in emerging markets.

    Samsung achieved a 7% year-on-year growth thanks to the excellent performance of its S25 series.

    Xiaomi jumped to third place with an astonishing 55% increase, mainly due to strong demand in the Chinese market and the brand effect brought by the launch of its high-end electric vehicles.

    Notably, Google returned to the top five premium smartphone brands after five years, with its Pixel 9 series sales doubling year-on-year, driven by expansion into new markets and more aggressive marketing strategies.

Regionally, China remains the world's largest premium market and contributed the most growth. India became the fastest-growing market with a 37% year-on-year increase, primarily driven by Apple's strong performance and convenient financing policies. 从地区来看，中国仍是全球最大的高端市场，并贡献了最多的增量。印度则以 37% 的同比增长成为增速最快的市场，主要受苹果强劲表现与便捷融资政策推动。

Devices with generative AI (GenAI) capabilities account for over 80% of the premium market. As hardware differences gradually narrow, the AI ecosystem is becoming a crucial factor for consumers when choosing premium smartphones. 而具备生成式 AI（GenAI）能力的设备在高端市场中占比超过 80%。随着硬件差距逐渐缩小，AI 生态系统正成为消费者选购高端手机的重要考量因素。

Additionally, foldable devices continue to grow. The report states that although still niche, their unique form factor and differentiated positioning make them key for brands to expand their premium product lines; Apple is expected to enter the market in 2026, which may further drive the development of this category. 另外，折叠屏设备也在持续增长。报告称，尽管仍属小众，但其独特形态与差异化定位使其成为品牌拓展高端产品线的关键；苹果预计将于 2026 年入局，或将进一步推动该品类的发展。

item.title: 阿里夸克回应「教育计划」风波
item.guid: 阿里夸克回应「教育计划」风波
item.description:
On September 11, Alibaba's AI application Quark released the "Explanation on the Rights and Interests of International Students in the Education Program" on its official Weibo, responding to recent controversies such as identity verification for international students in China triggered by the "Education Program". 9 月 11 日，阿里巴巴旗下 AI 应用夸克在官方微博发布了《关于教育计划留学生权益的情况说明》，就近期「教育计划 」引发的在华留学生身份认证等争议进行了回复。

The official statement said that it had noticed that some international students encountered problems in claiming benefits when participating in the "Education Program," and the platform immediately conducted process investigations and user surveys. 官方声明称已关注到部分留学生在参与「教育计划」时遇到无法领取权益的问题，平台第一时间开展流程排查和用户调研。

Upon verification, it was found that foreign students in China can, in principle, complete certification through CHSI (China Higher Education Student Information) website and enjoy the same education program benefits as domestic students. However, in actual operation, there may be a time lag in the entry of student status information by some universities, which may lead to certification failure. In such cases, it is recommended to contact the relevant departments of the university to confirm information updates. 经核查发现，对于在华外国留学生原则上可通过学信网完成认证，享受与国内学生同样的教育计划权益。但在实际操作中，部分高校的学籍信息录入存在时间差，可能导致认证失败。遇到此类情况，建议联系所在高校相关部门确认信息更新。

The statement also mentioned that for Chinese students studying abroad, student verification relies on the China Higher Education Student Information (CHSI) website, thus preventing them from completing certification. New certification channel development work has now been initiated to cover every teacher and student as much as possible. 声明中还提到，对于在海外的中国留学生，因学生认证依赖于中国高等教育学生信息（学信网），因此无法完成认证，现在已经启动了新的认证通道开发工作，尽最大可能覆盖每一位师生。

It is reported that Quark launched its education program at the end of August, allowing enrolled university students and teachers to receive free membership services for a certain period after completing identity verification, and subsequently enjoy exclusive discounts. 据悉，夸克在 8 月底发布了教育计划，在校大学生及教师完成身份认证后，可免费领取一定时间的会员服务，并在后续享受专属优惠。

However, some international students later stated that despite also studying at Chinese universities, they were unable to complete the certification process after repeated attempts. An international student in China posted on the social media platform Xiaohongshu, saying that they could not complete the certification when using Quark's newly launched "Education Program," and thus could not obtain relevant membership benefits. The related topic "Quark forgot us" subsequently emerged, sparking heated discussion. 但后续有部分留学生表示，尽管同样就读于中国高校，反复尝试后仍无法完成认证流程。有在华留学生在社交媒体小红书发帖称，自己在使用夸克新上线的「教育计划」时无法完成认证，因而无法获得相关会员权益。相关话题「夸克忘了我们」也随之出现，引发热议。

item.title: 💡 2025 外滩大会与人工智能带来的「新秩序」
item.guid: 💡-2025-外滩大会与人工智能带来的「新秩序」
item.description:
Yesterday morning, the 2025 Inclusion · Bund Conference officially opened at the Shanghai Huangpu Expo Park. Three speakers, Wang Jian, Richard Sutton, and Yuval Noah Harari, jointly analyzed "The 'New Order' Brought by Artificial Intelligence" from different perspectives. 昨天上午，2025 Inclusion · 外滩大会在上海黄浦世博园区正式开幕。王坚、理查德 · 萨顿和尤瓦尔·赫拉利三位发言人共同围绕「人工智能带来的『新秩序』」，从不同视角进行了解析。

"The Era of Experience" and the Reshaping of Learning Paradigms 「经验时代」与学习范式的重塑

Richard Sutton, the 2024 Turing Award laureate and "Father of Reinforcement Learning," proposed that AI is moving from a phase dependent on human data to an "era of experience" centered on continuous learning, emphasizing that its potential will far exceed the past. 2024 年图灵奖得主、「强化学习之父」理查德 · 萨顿提出人工智能正从依赖人类数据的阶段迈向以持续学习为核心的「经验时代」，并强调其潜力将远超以往。

Sutton pointed out that most current machine learning methods merely transfer existing human knowledge to static AI lacking autonomous learning capabilities, and the human data dividend is nearing its limit. 萨顿指出，当下大多数机器学习方法仅是将人类已有知识转移到静态、缺乏自主学习能力的 AI 上，而人类数据红利已接近极限。

Existing methods cannot generate new knowledge, are not suitable for continuous learning, and continuous learning is crucial for the utility of intelligence.

He believes that future intelligent agents should acquire three types of signals – "observation, action, reward" – through direct interaction with the world, continuously learning and optimizing from experience. This is also the core path behind AlphaGo's self-play "move 37" and AlphaProof's win at the International Mathematical Olympiad. 他认为，未来的智能体应通过与世界直接交互获取「观察、行动、奖励」三类信号，从经验中不断学习与优化，这也是 AlphaGo 自我博弈「第 37 手」以及 AlphaProof 在国际数学奥林匹克获奖的核心路径。

He divides cosmic history into the "Particle Era," "Stellar Era," "Replicator Era," and "Design Era," and believes that humanity is the catalyst and pioneer driving the "Design Era." "AI is the inevitable next step in cosmic evolution, and we should embrace it with courage, pride, and an adventurous spirit." 他将宇宙历史划分为「粒子时代」「恒星时代」「复制者时代」与「设计时代」，并认为人类正是推动「设计时代」开启的催化剂与先驱。「人工智能是宇宙演化的必然下一步，我们应以勇气、自豪和冒险精神来迎接它。」

The Crisis of "Cooperation and Empathy" 「合作与共情」的危机

Harari opened with a scene of a city operating on an ordinary morning in 2025, pointing out that AI is no longer just an automation tool but an "acting subject" capable of autonomous decision-making and even creating new ideas. "In the age of AI, speed alone is not progress." 赫拉利以 2025 年一个普通早晨的城市运转场景开场，指出人工智能已不仅是自动化工具，更是「会行动的主体」，能够自主决策甚至创造新想法。「在 AI 时代，单有速度，不是进步。」

He believes that progress should not only be measured by the speed of technological advancement but by humanity's ability to establish cooperation, trust, and empathy. He stated that every major technological revolution in history has required accompanying institutions and customs; for example, industrialization not only relied on steam engines but also mechanisms like corporate law, labor unions, environmental regulations, and social security networks. 他认为进步不应只以技术进步的速度衡量，而在于人类能否建立合作、信任与共情。他表示，历史上每一次重大技术变革都需要配套的制度与习惯，例如工业化不仅依赖蒸汽机，还需要公司法、工会、环保法规与社会保障网络等机制。

The unique aspect of AI is that it touches society's "central nervous system." The risk does not come from "a bad person pressing a bad button," but from the invisible transfer of power from accountable humans to unseen algorithms. 人工智能的特殊之处在于，它触及了社会的「中枢神经系统」，风险并非来自「一个坏人按下一个坏按钮」，而是来自无形中权力从可质询的人类转移到不可见的算法。

Any system that truly reshapes human society should not be launched first and then governed. Speed and safety can coexist, but only if we build self-correcting feedback loops.

Harari warned that if AI is rapidly developed before we learn to identify and correct system errors, the cost will be borne by the most vulnerable groups. He also emphasized that humanity must protect its ability to remember and tell its own stories, and not fully entrust it to non-human intelligence. 赫拉利警告，如果在尚未学会识别和纠正系统错误之前就贸然推动人工智能高速发展，代价将由最脆弱的群体承担。他还强调，人类必须守护记忆与讲述自身故事的能力，不能将其完全托付给非人类智能。

The Competition of "Open Source and Space Computing Power" 「开源与太空算力」的竞争

Wang Jian, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering and former CTO of Alibaba, shared his thoughts on open source, open resources, and AI entering space, focusing on the theme of "openness" in the age of AI. He pointed out that 2025 is an extraordinary year in the history of AI development, and "openness" has become an unavoidable core variable. 中国工程院院士、阿里巴巴前 CTO 王坚则围绕人工智能时代的「开放」话题，分享了他对开源、开放资源以及 AI 进入太空的思考。他指出，2025 年是人工智能发展史上极不平凡的一年，「开放」已成为无法回避的核心变量。

Today, we are experiencing a very different revolutionary change, from the openness and open source of code to the openness and open source of resources.

Notably, Wang Jian also disclosed the latest progress of Zhijiang Lab in AI space applications. On May 14 this year, they successfully launched the "Three-Body Computing Constellation," consisting of 12 satellites, into space for the first time. It is now running a complete 8B AI model in orbit, achieving inter-satellite connectivity and in-orbit data processing. 值得关注的是，王坚还披露了之江实验室在 AI 太空化方面的最新进展。今年 5 月 14 日，他们首次将 12 颗卫星组成的「三体计算星座」送入太空，并在轨运行完整的 8B AI 模型，实现卫星间互联互通与在轨数据处理。

He stated that future plans include opening the satellites to global users and exploring the possibility of sending AI and computing power into solar orbit to address the challenge of real-time data transmission back to Earth during deep space exploration. He frankly said: "On the way to Mars, humanity cannot be without the companionship of computing and AI." 他表示，未来计划将卫星开放给全球用户，并探索将 AI 与算力送入太阳轨道的可能性，以应对深空探测中无法将数据实时传回地面的挑战。他直言：「人类去火星的路上，是不能没有计算的陪伴和 AI。」

item.title: 富士发布首款中画幅电影机
item.guid: 富士发布首款中画幅电影机
item.description:
Recently, Fujifilm officially launched its first digital cinema camera designed specifically for professional filmmaking – the GFX ETERNA. Its main specifications are as follows: 近日，富士正式推出旗下首款专为专业电影制作打造的数码摄影机 —— GFX ETERNA。其主要参数如下：

    Equipped with a "GFX 102MP CMOS II HS" medium format sensor, 102 million pixels, size 44x33mm, supporting dual native ISO (ISO 800 / ISO 3200); features a high-speed image processing engine "X-Processor 5"; built-in electronic variable ND filter;

    Features a 3-inch 1.04 million-dot screen, with an additional detachable 5-inch 6.22 million-dot screen, offering a maximum brightness of 2,000 nits;

    Uses NP-W235 battery; supports CFExpress™ Type B and SD cards;

    The body weighs approximately 2.0kg, with dimensions of 110.8 x 138.2 x 176.8mm.

In terms of color, the GFX ETERNA is equipped with Fujifilm's exclusive「Digital Film Science」technology, featuring 20 built-in film simulation modes and supporting the import of up to 16 3D LUTs. 色彩方面，GFX ETERNA 配备富士独家的「Digital Film Science」技术，内置 20 种胶片模拟模式，并支持导入最多 16 个 3D LUTs。

Regarding recording specifications, this model can output up to 8K/30P 12-bit RAW video data, supports Apple ProRes codec format, and native 4:3 OpenGate format shooting. 录制规格方面，该机型可输出高达 8K/30P 的 12 位 RAW 视频数据，并支持 Apple ProRes 编解码格式，支持原生 4:3 OpenGate 格式拍摄。

Fujifilm announced that the first batch of GFX ETERNA will begin shipping in October 2025, with some authorized dealers opening pre-orders from September 15th. In terms of price, Fujifilm's US official website shows the suggested retail price for the GFX ETERNA is $16,499.95 (approximately RMB 117,484). 富士表示，GFX ETERNA 将于 2025 年 10 月开启首批出货，部分授权经销商将于 9 月 15 日起开放预订。价格方面，富士美国官网显示 GFX ETERNA 的建议零售价为 16,499.95 美元（约合人民币 117,484 元）。

item.title: 通义千问发布下一代基础模型架构 Qwen3-Next
item.guid: 通义千问发布下一代基础模型架构-Qwen3-Next
item.description:
Early this morning, Tongyi Qianwen released its next-generation foundational model architecture, Qwen3-Next, and open-sourced the Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B series models based on this architecture. 今天凌晨，通义千问发布了下一代基础模型架构 Qwen3-Next，并开源了基于该架构的 Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B 系列模型。

The official statement indicates that Context Length Scaling and Total Parameter Scaling are considered the two major trends in the future development of large models. To further enhance the model's training and inference efficiency under long contexts and large total parameters, Tongyi Qianwen designed the brand-new Qwen3-Next model structure. 官方表示，其认为 Context Length Scaling 和 Total Parameter Scaling 是未来大模型发展的两大趋势。为了进一步提升模型在长上下文和大规模总参数下的训练和推理效率，通义千问设计了全新的 Qwen3-Next 的模型结构。

According to the introduction, Qwen3-Next has made the following core improvements compared to Qwen3's MoE model structure: hybrid attention mechanism, high-sparsity MoE structure, a series of training-stable and friendly optimizations, and a multi-token prediction mechanism to improve inference efficiency. 据介绍，Qwen3-Next 相比 Qwen3 的 MoE 模型结构,进行了以下核心改进：混合注意力机制、高稀疏度 MoE 结构、一系列训练稳定友好的优化，以及提升推理效率的多 token 预测机制。

Based on the Qwen3-Next model structure, Tongyi also trained the Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Base model. This model has 80 billion parameters but only activates 3 billion parameters, achieving performance similar to or even slightly better than the Qwen3-32B dense model. 基于 Qwen3-Next 的模型结构，通义还训练了 Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Base 模型。该模型拥有 800 亿参数仅激活 30 亿参数，并实现了与Qwen3-32B dense 模型相近甚至略好的性能。

The training cost (GPU hours) of Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Base is less than one-tenth of Qwen3-32B, and its inference throughput in contexts above 32k is more than ten times that of Qwen3-32B, achieving extreme training and inference cost-effectiveness. 而 Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Base 训练成本（GPU hours）仅为 Qwen3-32B 的十分之一不到，在 32k 以上的上下文下的推理吞吐则是 Qwen3-32B 的十倍以上，实现了极致的训练和推理性价比。

At the same time, Tongyi also simultaneously developed and released Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Instruct and Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Thinking, based on the Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Base model: 同时，通义还基于 Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Base 型, 同步开发并发布了 Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Instruct 与 Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Thinking：

    Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Instruct performs comparably to the flagship model Qwen3-235B-A22B-Instruct-2507, while demonstrating significant advantages in 256K ultra-long context processing tasks;

    Qwen3-Next-80B-A3B-Thinking demonstrates excellent performance in complex reasoning tasks, not only outperforming the higher pre-training cost Qwen3-30B-A3B-Thinking-2507 and Qwen3-32B-Thinking, but also surpassing the closed-source model Gemini-2.5-Flash-Thinking in multiple benchmark tests, with some key indicators already approaching Qwen3-235B-A22B-Thinking-2507.

Currently, the new models are online. 目前，新模型已上线。

item.title: 韩伯啸：vivo X300 是 X200 Pro mini 的升级版
item.guid: 韩伯啸：vivo-X300-是-X200-Pro-mini-的升级版
item.description:
Yesterday, Vivo Product Manager Han Boxiao reviewed the sales performance of the X200 series on Weibo and revealed more details for the upcoming X300 series new products. 昨天，vivo 产品经理韩伯啸在微博回顾了 X200 系列的销量表现，并为即将到来的 X300 系列新品透露更多细节。

Han Boxiao stated: "The sales of the X200 Pro series have exceeded 2 million units, an increase of 1 million units compared to the previous generation X100 Pro, doubling year-on-year. The 'dual Pro launch' strategy, featuring the X200 Pro mini and the imaging flagship X200 Pro, was key to our breakthrough." 韩伯啸表示：「X200 Pro 系列销量已突破 200 万台，较上一代 X100 Pro 增长 100 万台，销量同比翻番。X200 Pro mini 与影像旗舰 X200 Pro 的『双 Pro 齐发』策略，是我们取得突破的关键。」

Regarding the upcoming X300 series, Han Boxiao revealed: "The X300 is the legitimate iterative model of the X200 Pro mini." He emphasized that the X300's design philosophy is to benchmark Apple's Pro series, aiming to create the industry's strongest small-screen standard flagship. According to Han Boxiao, the X300 will feature the following highlights: 针对即将登场的 X300 系列，韩伯啸透露：「X300 就是 X200 Pro mini 的正统迭代款」。他强调，X300 的设计理念是对标苹果 Pro 系列，目标是打造业界最强的小屏标准旗舰。据韩伯啸介绍，本次 X300 将具有以下亮点：

    6.31-inch 8T LTPO small straight screen, using BOE's exclusive display, supporting hardware 1nit eye protection;

    Equipped with APO periscope telephoto, supporting telephoto macro; equipped with ultrasonic fingerprint, high-spec USB interface.

Yesterday afternoon, Han Boxiao continued to reveal the X300 Pro's "three major firsts": 昨日下午，韩伯啸继续透露了 X300 Pro 的「三大首发」：

    Global debut of vivo's self-developed Huanyu signal amplification chipset, including a signal chip combination of 1 communication enhancement chip + 4 WiFi enhancement chips;

    Global debut of black technology storage performance: The top-tier X300 Pro version globally debuts dual UFS4.1 4Lane, with large file read/write speeds increasing by over 70%, and maximum read/write speeds reaching 8.6 Gb/s.

In terms of imaging, the X300 Pro is even more highly anticipated. "Zeiss dual 200 million, imaging kings, one super, many strong," Han Boxiao stated, adding that the X300 Pro will become a new generation imaging flagship, with its imaging capabilities benchmarked against the industry's "super large cup" models, making it highly anticipated. 而在影像方面，X300 Pro 更是被寄予厚望。「蔡司双两亿，影像大小王，一超多强」，韩伯啸表示，X300 Pro 将成为新一代影像旗舰，其影像实力将对标行业「超大杯」，值得期待。

item.title: 蚂蚁百宝箱 Tbox 超级智能体亮相
item.guid: 蚂蚁百宝箱-Tbox-超级智能体亮相
item.description:
At the 2025 Inclusion · Bund Conference held yesterday, Ant Baibaoxiang officially released its new product, Tbox Super Intelligent Agent. 在昨日举办的 2025 Inclusion · 外滩大会上，蚂蚁百宝箱正式发布全新产品 Tbox 超级智能体。

According to the official introduction, the product uses a multi-agent collaborative architecture, allowing multiple intelligent agents on the platform to form working groups, collectively complete user-specified tasks, and directly deliver results. 官方介绍，该产品通过多智能体协同架构，让平台上的多个智能体能够组建工作小组，共同完成用户指定任务，并直接交付成果。

It is reported that with Tbox, users only need one natural language instruction, and the system can automatically dispatch over 20 expert intelligent agents such as search assistants, PPT designers, web engineers, and podcast hosts to form parallel collaborations, generating teaching-level PPTs in as fast as 5 minutes, and completing about 15 pages of visualized reports and simultaneously launching interactive web pages in 10 minutes. 据悉，通过 Tbox，用户只需一句自然语言指令，系统即可自动调度搜索助手、PPT 设计师、网页工程师播客主播等 20 余位专家智能体，形成并行协作，最快 5 分钟即可生成教学级 PPT，10 分钟完成约 15 页的可视化报告并同步上线交互式网页。

Wang Yuefan, the technical lead, revealed that Tbox adopts a "dynamic orchestration engine" that can adjust the number of intelligent agents and collaboration paths in real-time based on task complexity, making it more flexible than traditional serial processes. At the same time, the new version continues the "no-code" experience, where users only need to describe their requirements to directly obtain various outputs such as PPTs, web pages, podcasts, and documents. 技术负责人王月凡透露，Tbox 采用「动态编排引擎」，能够根据任务复杂度实时调整智能体数量和协作路径，相比传统串行流程更灵活。同时，新版本延续了「无代码」体验，用户只需描述需求，即可直接获得 PPT、网页、播客、文档等多种成果。

It is worth mentioning that Tbox will also launch an "intelligent agent marketplace" in the future, allowing developers to list their self-built industry agents, provide services to global users, and earn revenue. 值得一提的是，Tbox 未来还将上线「智能体市场」，允许开发者将自建行业 Agent 上架，为全球用户提供服务并获得收益。

At the launch event, Wu Jiahao, product lead for Baibaoxiang, also stated that the new Tbox version will first introduce "pay-per-outcome" packages in industries such as consulting and education, where clients only pay for the quantity of final results, without needing to worry about underlying computing power and models; in the future, SDKs and APIs will be provided to help enterprises integrate their self-developed intelligent agents into existing workflows. 发布现场，百宝箱产品负责人吴嘉豪还表示 Tbox 新版本将在咨询、教育等行业率先推出「按成果计费」套餐，客户只需为最终成果数量付费，无需关心底层算力和模型；未来将提供 SDK 与 API，帮助企业将自研智能体接入既有工作流。

Currently, Ant Baibaoxiang Tbox is live: 🔗 www.tbox.cn 目前，蚂蚁百宝箱 Tbox 已上线：🔗 www.tbox.cn

item.title: 小红书回应「被约谈警告」
item.guid: 小红书回应「被约谈警告」
item.description:
According to CCTV News, yesterday, the Xiaohongshu platform was summoned and warned by relevant authorities due to prominent issues in information content management. The Cyberspace Administration of China (CAC) instructed the Shanghai Cyberspace Administration to take measures against Xiaohongshu, including summoning, ordering rectification within a time limit, issuing warnings, and strictly dealing with responsible persons, in accordance with relevant laws and regulations such as the "Regulations on the Governance of the Online Information Content Ecosystem." 据央视新闻报道，昨日，小红书平台因在信息内容管理上存在突出问题，被有关部门约谈警告。国家网信办指导上海市网信办，依据《网络信息内容生态治理规定》等相关法律法规，对小红书采取了约谈、责令限期改正、警告、以及从严处理责任人等措施。

It is reported that Xiaohongshu was summoned mainly for the following three reasons: 据悉，本次小红书被约谈主要有以下三点原因：

    Failure to implement the primary responsibility for information content management

    Frequent appearance of trending topics related to celebrity personal dynamics and trivial matters in key sections of the hot search list

    Spreading undesirable information content, disrupting the online ecosystem

The Cyberspace Administration stated that it will continue to focus on illegal and non-compliant issues that disrupt the online ecosystem, leverage the "sharp sword" role of cyber enforcement, urge various platforms to earnestly fulfill their main and social responsibilities, and maintain a clean and clear cyberspace. 网信部门表示，将持续聚焦破坏网络生态的违法违规问题，发挥网络执法「利剑」作用，督促各类平台切实履行主体责任和社会责任，维护清朗网络空间。

On the same day, Xiaohongshu's official account "Shu Guanjia" issued an announcement and responded to the above situation: 同日，小红书官方账号「薯管家」发布公告并回应了上述情况：

Recently, the Cyberspace Administration interviewed Xiaohongshu platform regarding its poor management of trending topic lists and imposed penalties. We sincerely accept this, deeply learn from the lesson, and earnestly implement the rectification requirements.

Shu Guanjia stated that Xiaohongshu has, in accordance with the requirements of the Cyberspace Administration, immediately established a special rectification working group to promote special governance of the trending topic list ecosystem and further enhance its management capabilities. 薯管家表示，小红书已对照网信部门的要求，第一时间成立整改专项工作小组，推进热搜榜单生态专项治理，进一步提升热搜榜单管理能力。

Additionally, Xiaohongshu emphasized that under the guidance of the Cyberspace Administration, it will take this as a warning, draw inferences from it, and earnestly fulfill its main responsibility for information content management and social responsibility. At the same time, it will humbly accept supervision from users and public opinion, and actively maintain a clean and clear cyberspace. 另外，小红书强调，将在网信部门的指导下，以此为戒，举一反三，切实履行信息内容管理主体责任和社会责任。同时虚心接受广大用户和社会舆论监督，积极维护清朗网络空间。

item.title: 哈啰回应「共享单车自动落锁致用户摔伤」
item.guid: 哈啰回应「共享单车自动落锁致用户摔伤」
item.description:
According to a report by Yicai, HelloBike has responded to the recently discussed "shared bicycle automatic locking causing user injury" incident. 据第一财经报道，哈啰单车对近日引发讨论的「共享单车自动落锁致用户摔伤事件」进行了回应。

In its response, HelloBike stated: "The technical team, based on user big data analysis, found no abnormal situations where vehicles automatically locked due to technical defects." 在回应中，哈啰单车表示：「技术团队依据用户大数据排查，未发现车辆存在因技术缺陷导致自动落锁的异常情况」。

HelloBike also mentioned that, under normal circumstances, vehicles do not automatically lock during riding. According to HelloBike: 哈啰单车还提到，在正常情况下，车辆并不会在骑行过程中自动落锁。据哈罗单车表示：

During vehicle operation, as long as the speed is greater than 0.5m/s, the lock will refuse to execute the locking command. Only when the vehicle stops at a very low speed will the user's locking command be executed.

It is reported that Didi Qingju had previously responded to similar incidents, stating that the vehicles "do not have software or technical issues": 据悉，滴滴青桔在此前已对此类事件进行了回应，称车辆「不存在软件技术等问题」：

Based on user feedback, Didi Qingju conducted parallel hardware and software inspections on the involved bicycles. Upon verification, it was found that the involved vehicles might have experienced riding stuttering due to a loose chain, but there were no software or technical issues.

According to data from the China Road Transport Association, as of the end of 2023, the number of internet-rented bicycles deployed nationwide exceeded 12 million, covering over 410 cities. The reliability of shared bicycle safety mechanisms has become a matter of public interest. 据中国道路运输协会数据，截至 2023 年底，全国互联网租赁自行车投放量超过 1200 万辆，覆盖超 410 个城市。共享单车安全机制的可靠性已成为公共利益问题。

item.title: 星巴克中国出售进入最后阶段
item.guid: 星巴克中国出售进入最后阶段
item.description:
According to a report by Cailian Press yesterday, the equity sale process for Starbucks China has reached a critical juncture. The company has listed Boyu Capital, The Carlyle Group, EQT, and Sequoia China as final candidates, and the deal is expected to be finalized by the end of October. 据财联社昨日报道，星巴克中国的股权出售进程迎来关键节点，该公司已将博裕资本、凯雷集团、EQT 与红杉中国列为最终候选方，交易预计将在 10 月底前敲定结果。

The key to this transaction lies in the equity ratio. A CNBC report in July stated that Starbucks might retain approximately 30% of the shares, with the remainder distributed among multiple investors, each holding no more than 30%. Starbucks CEO Brian Niccol, in an earlier released Q3 FY2025 earnings report, emphasized "the desire to retain a significant proportion of equity in the China business" to ensure the company's dominant position in the Chinese market. 此次交易的关键在于股权比例。七月 CNBC 的一篇报道称，星巴克可能保留约 30% 的股份，其余由多家投资方分摊，每家持股不超过 30%。星巴克首席执行官倪睿安（Brian Niccol）则在早前发布的 2025 财年第三季度财报中强调「希望保留中国业务相当比例的股权」，以确保公司在中国市场的主导地位。

Starbucks is actively promoting deep expansion in the Chinese market, aiming to achieve a layout of "tens of thousands of stores" in the future. Currently, Starbucks has a total of 7,828 stores in China, with 70 new stores opened in the latest fiscal quarter alone. 星巴克正积极推动在中国市场的深度拓展，目标是在未来实现「数以万计门店」的布局。目前，星巴克在华门店总数已达 7828 家，仅在最新财季就新开 70 家。

It is worth noting that Starbucks China has shown stronger autonomy in its operations in recent years. For example, it has reached deep cooperation with Xiaohongshu, launching the "Interest Community Space" program, covering over 1,800 stores nationwide. At the same time, Starbucks China has also gained some product pricing power, with several beverages seeing a price reduction of about 5 yuan since June, driving significant sales growth. 值得注意的是，星巴克中国近年来在运营上展现出更强的自主性。例如，其已与小红书达成深度合作，启动「兴趣社区空间」计划，覆盖全国 1800 余家门店。同时，星巴克中国也获得了部分产品定价权，6 月起多款饮品降价约 5 元，带动销量显著增长。

However, Starbucks still faces fierce competition in the Chinese market. Luckin Coffee's Q2 revenue grew by 47.1% year-on-year to 12.36 billion yuan, with a total of 26,206 stores, far exceeding Starbucks. Cotti Coffee stores have also surpassed 15,000 and achieved profitability. 不过，星巴克在中国市场仍面临激烈竞争。瑞幸咖啡二季度营收同比增长 47.1% 至 123.6 亿元，门店总数达 26206 家，远超星巴克。库迪咖啡门店也突破 15000 家，并实现盈利。

In such a market landscape, the future operator of Starbucks China will determine whether it can maintain its competitiveness. Brian Niccol frankly stated: "Finding partners who better understand China is key to Starbucks' expansion in China." 在这样的市场格局下，星巴克中国的未来运营方将决定其能否继续保持竞争力。倪睿安坦言：「找到更懂中国的合作方，是星巴克在华扩张的关键。」

item.title: 科幻视觉小说游戏《BatteryNote》定档 10 月 10 日
item.guid: 科幻视觉小说游戏《BatteryNote》定档-10-月-10-日
item.description:
The sci-fi adventure visual novel game "BatteryNote", created by 72studio, has officially announced its release on October 10th, with its original soundtrack also launching simultaneously to provide players with an immersive audio-visual experience. 由 72studio 打造的科幻冒险视觉小说游戏《BatteryNote》正式宣布将于 10 月 10 日发售，原声音乐也将同步上线，为玩家带来沉浸式的视听体验。

The game tells the story of a "failed mechanic" who awakens from cryogenic sleep and encounters three robots on the verge of breakdown. Players will charge the depleted robots in a dimly lit garage and explore their memories and emotions through dialogue and interaction. The three robots are the restaurant service robot "Jessica," the security robot "Sabelli," and the combat robot "Charge R7," each with unique characteristics. 游戏讲述了一位从冷冻睡眠中苏醒的「失败机械师」与三台濒临损坏的机器人相遇的故事。玩家将在昏暗车库中为电量耗尽的机器人充电，并通过对话与互动探索它们的记忆与情感。三位机器人分别是餐厅服务机器人「杰西卡」、安保机器人「萨贝利」以及战斗机器人「冲锋号 R7」，各具特色。

Game features include: 游戏特色包括：

    Nostalgic four-color pixel art style, recreating the visual style of 90s handheld consoles

    Engage in deep conversations with charming robot characters

    Each playthrough is about 15 minutes, easy and casual, suitable for short bursts of playtime

    Players must make choices within a limited battery life, determining the robots' "remaining life" trajectory

Players can choose to unlock all ending achievements, or simply play with the goal of "making them happy." The development team emphasizes that this work is not just a sci-fi adventure, but a journey about choices and emotions. 玩家可以选择解锁所有结局成就，或单纯以「让它们幸福」为目标进行游玩。开发团队强调，本作不仅是一场科幻冒险，更是一段关于选择与情感的旅程。

It is reported that "BatteryNote" will first launch on the PC platform, with more release information to be announced by the official later. 据悉，《BatteryNote》首发将登陆 PC 平台，更多发售信息尚待官方后续公布。

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro 拍摄，王嘉尔新 MV 明天见
item.guid: iPhone-17-Pro-拍摄，王嘉尔新-MV-明天见
item.description:
On September 10, at the end of Apple's autumn new product launch event, Jackson Wang made a surprise appearance, bringing an "easter egg" style debut to a global audience. 9 月 10 日，在苹果秋季新品发布会的尾声，王嘉尔惊喜现身，为全球观众带来一场「彩蛋式」亮相。

Immediately after the press conference, he officially announced the pre-release information for his new MV "Let Loose" via social media. The topic "Apple Event Easter Egg Features Jackson Wang" trended on Weibo, sparking heated discussion among fans. 而就在发布会结束后，他通过社交平台官宣了新 MV《Let Loose》的预热信息，话题「苹果发布会彩蛋有王嘉尔」登上微博热搜，引发粉丝热议。

According to Jackson Wang himself, the "Let Loose" MV was entirely shot using iPhone 17 Pro, combining the latest imaging technology to present visuals with exceptional quality. 据王嘉尔本人透露，《Let Loose》MV 全程采用 iPhone 17 Pro 拍摄，结合最新影像技术，呈现出极具质感的视觉效果。

Jackson Wang wrote on Weibo: "This time, the 'Let Loose' MV was shot with iPhone 17 Pro 📱 🤫 Watch it together on September 13," and included a 30-second preview clip, featuring a bold and avant-garde visual style with a strong sense of rhythm. 王嘉尔在微博中写道：「这次《Let Loose》MV 用了 iPhone 17 Pro 📱 🤫 9 月 13 日一起看」，并配上了 30 秒预告片段，画面风格大胆前卫，节奏感十足。

It is reported that Jackson Wang personally participated in the creative conception and filming execution of this MV, striving to showcase the charm of music and visual integration through the phone's lens. This collaboration also marks a cross-industry attempt by Apple to demonstrate the iPhone 17 Pro's imaging capabilities. 据悉，王嘉尔亲自参与本次 MV 的创意构思与拍摄执行，力求通过手机镜头展现音乐与影像的融合魅力。此次合作也成为苹果展示 iPhone 17 Pro 影像能力的一次跨界尝试。

item.title: 《窗外是蓝星》热映突破 1500 万票房
item.guid: 《窗外是蓝星》热映突破-1500-万票房
item.description:
Recently, China's first space documentary "Blue Star Outside the Window," personally filmed by Chinese astronauts, officially premiered in cinemas nationwide on September 5, quickly winning critical acclaim from audiences for its authentic footage and profound emotions. 日前，中国首部由中国航天员亲自拍摄的太空纪录片《窗外是蓝星》于 9 月 5 日正式登陆全国院线，凭借真实影像与深刻情感迅速赢得观众好评。

As of now, the film boasts a Douban rating of 8.6, with box office revenue exceeding 15 million yuan and over 300,000 viewers, making it the highest-rated domestic documentary film of 2025. According to Mtime, many viewers commented on the film, saying, "This is a double feast for the eyes and soul" and "This is not a movie, but a true diary of humanity stepping out of Earth's cradle." 截至目前，影片豆瓣评分高达 8.6 分，票房突破 1500 万，观影人次超过 30 万，成为 2025 年国产纪录电影评分最高作品。据时光网报道，对于影片，不少观众表示「这是视觉与心灵的双重盛宴」「这不是电影，而是人类走出地球摇篮的真实日记」。

The film was shot by the Shenzhou-13 crew, Zhai Zhigang, Wang Yaping, and Ye Guangfu, at the Chinese space station, directed by Zhu Yiran, with Wang Yaping as the narrator. The entire film is set against the backdrop of their 183-day space residency mission, showcasing the astronauts' work and life, as well as the magnificent views of Earth. A domestically produced special 8K camera brings Earth's wonders, such as the snow-capped peaks of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau and the intricate patterns of the Taklamakan Desert, to the screen, delivering unprecedented visual impact. 影片由神舟十三号乘组翟志刚、王亚平、叶光富在中国空间站拍摄，导演朱翌冉执导，王亚平担任旁白。全片以 183 天太空驻留任务为背景，展现了航天员的工作与生活，以及地球的壮丽景色。国产特制 8K 摄影机将青藏高原雪冠、塔克拉玛干沙漠脉络等地球奇观搬上银幕，带来前所未有的视觉震撼。

It is worth mentioning that the film's roadshow, themed "Forget Gravity," commenced on September 4 from Hefei, passing through cities like Shanghai, Hangzhou, and Beijing, and is scheduled to conclude back in Beijing after the Changchun stop. 值得一提的是，影片路演活动以「忘掉地心引力」为主题，已于 9 月 4 日从合肥启程，途经上海、杭州、北京等城市，计划在长春站结束后重返北京收官。

The film is now showing nationwide, offering multiple formats including CINITY 4K 50fps, CINITY LED, IMAX, CGS China Giant Screen, and 4DX, providing an ultimate viewing experience. 影片现已在全国热映，提供 CINITY 4K 50 帧版、CINITY LED 版、IMAX、CGS 中国巨幕、4DX 等多格式版本，带来极致观影体验。

item.title: 《一战再战》定档 10 月 17 日
item.guid: 《一战再战》定档-10-月-17-日
item.description:
Recently, Paul Thomas Anderson's latest self-written and self-directed thriller crime film "One Battle After Another" officially announced its release date, set to premiere in mainland China on October 17, 2025. 近日，由保罗·托马斯·安德森自编自导的最新惊悚犯罪片《一战再战》（One Battle After Another）正式宣布定档，将于 2025 年 10 月 17 日在中国大陆上映。

It is reported that this film is adapted from Thomas Pynchon's novel "The Vineyard," centering on the fate of revolutionaries and family ties, depicting the thrilling journey of a pair of male and female outlaws and their daughter participating in an anti-government organization. 据悉，本片改编自托马斯·品钦的小说《葡萄园》，以革命者的宿命与家庭羁绊为核心，描绘一对雌雄大盗与女儿共同参与反政府组织的惊险旅程。

Currently, over 13,000 users on Douban have marked it as "want to watch," with its popularity continuously rising. 目前，豆瓣平台已有超过 1.3 万名用户标记「想看」，热度持续攀升。
